articles.content: Following the release of the third beta of macOS Ventura 13.4, watchOS 9.5, and tvOS 16.5 to developers, Apple on Tuesday also released iOS 16.5 beta 3. The update brings overall improvements and new… [+1520 chars]

articles.title: TikTok is testing a new option to create AI-generated avatars for profile pictures - CNN
